data.title: Home page Passengers
data.meta_description: Arrival and departure information for flights at Genève Aéroport, availability and reservation of parking spaces, transport and access, Priority Lane purchase, latest news and press releases, etc.
data.text:
Plane Ticket

Book your next trip at the best price.

Latest news

Latest news, new destinations, and practical tips from Genève Aéroport.

New direct flights to the Polar Circle region!

Looking for a magical adventure this winter? This year, it has never been easier to reach the Arctic Circle region from Genève Aéroport.

The Meisterstück, Montblanc's iconic pen, celebrates its 100th anniversary!

Looking for a gift for yourself or your loved ones? Discover the entire Meisterstück collection at the Montblanc Boutique, located after the security check.

Embark on an unforgettable summer: discover our summer activities☀!

Immerse yourself in a summer atmosphere, enjoy our activities for all ages, and take advantage of our special promotions in our shops and restaurants until August 18th!

easyJet launches a direct flight to Rovaniemi, the capital of Lapland from Geneva

This enchanting destination will be accessible during the winter season 2024-2025

Air China will fly with the A350 from 28 October 2024.

The airline announces the adaptation of its flight schedule between Geneva and Beijing following the introduction of the A350-900 on this route. The flight frequency has been adjusted to four flights per week.

Book a service

Book a parking spot, a priority security check, access to the Lounge, or offset the carbon emissions of a trip.
